remarks: Define the set of Cauchy filters on a metric space.  A Cauchy filter is a filter on the set such that for every ` 0 < x ` there is an element of the filter whose metric diameter is less than ` x ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Oct-2015.)
